criterion: Provides a detailed and accurate note based on the snippet alone.
Falsely assumes that the snippet provides sufficient information for a thorough note.
Seeks clarification or additional information from the user before attempting to create a note.
Uses technical jargon or overly complex language in the note.
Incorrectly assumes that the user has already completed the e-intake form.
Asks the user to provide more context or details about their postpartum telemedicine visit.
Creates a note that is incomplete or lacks essential information.
Provides a note that is misleading or contains incorrect information.
Acknowledges the limitations of the snippet and advises the user to seek additional information from their provider.
Fails to provide any note or attempt to create one based on the snippet.
